body_html:
Ok, looks like we just need to add an extra include dir. I just tested by changing copts to:
copts = tf_copts() + ["-Iexternal/gemmlowp"],
and can confirm it builds. Let's just hope it works for you at runtime :)
body_text:
Ok, looks like we just need to add an extra include dir. I just tested by changing copts to:
copts = tf_copts() + ["-Iexternal/gemmlowp"],
and can confirm it builds. Let's just hope it works for you at runtime :)
body:
Ok, looks like we just need to add an extra include dir. I just tested by changing copts to:
    `copts = tf_copts() + ["-Iexternal/gemmlowp"],`
and can confirm it builds. Let's just hope it works for you at runtime :)
